content.question: Which of the following developments best reflects an attempt to address the “elite . . . misrule” described in the second paragraph of the excerpt?

choices.label: Strengthening the executive as a separate branch of the central government
Counting three-fifths of enslaved people toward representation in Congress
Making the new city of Washington, D.C., the seat of national government
Guaranteeing the essential rights of citizens in the Constitution

content.answer: Guaranteeing the essential rights of citizens in the Constitution

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
